content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Check relay connectivity Default relays are available inside Server & Workload Protection. Agents should be able to use them if they can connect to Server & Workload Protection. Note You might need more relays if, for example, you have many computers and want to reduce Internet bandwidth costs. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
